00031 void Champ_implementation_Q1::value_interpolation(const ArrOfDouble& position, int cell, const DoubleTab& values, ArrOfDouble& resu,int ncomp) const
00032 {
00033   const Zone&      zone              = get_zone_geom();
00034   const IntTab&    cells             = zone.les_elems();
00035   const int     nb_nodes_per_cell = zone.nb_som_elem();
00036 
00037   assert(cell>=0);
00038   assert(cell < cells.dimension_tot(0));
00039 
00040   if (ncomp!=-1)
00041     {
00042       for (int j=0; j< nb_nodes_per_cell; j++)
00043         {
00044           int node = cells(cell,j);
00045           resu(0) += values(node,ncomp) * form_function(position,cell,j);
00046         }
00047     }
00048   else
00049     {
00050       if (values.nb_dim()==1)
00051         {
00052           assert(resu.size_array()==1);
00053           for (int j=0; j< nb_nodes_per_cell; j++)
00054             {
00055               int node = cells(cell,j);
00056               resu(0) += values(node) * form_function(position,cell,j);
00057             }
00058         }
00059       else
00060         {
00061           int nb_components=resu.size_array();
00062           assert(values.nb_dim() == 2);
00063           assert(values.dimension(1) == nb_components);
00064           for (int j=0; j<nb_nodes_per_cell; j++)
00065             {
00066               double weight = form_function(position, cell, j);
00067               int node   = cells(cell,j);
00068               for (int k=0; k<nb_components; k++)
00069                 {
00070                   resu(k) += values(node,k) * weight;
00071                 }
00072             }
00073         }
00074     }
00075 }
00076 #else
00077 
00078 static int faces_sommets_quadra[4][2] =
00079 {
00080   { 0, 2 },
00081   { 0, 1 },
00082   { 1, 3 },
00083   { 2, 3 }
00084 };
00085

00088 
00089 void calcul_plan_quadra(Vecteur3& coeff_plan,double& d,int cell,const IntTab& cells,const DoubleTab& nodes,int dir)
00090 {
00091 // Plan 012
00092   int s0=cells(cell,faces_sommets_quadra[dir][0]);
00093   int s1=cells(cell,faces_sommets_quadra[dir][1]);
00094   double S0x=nodes(s0,0);
00095   double S0y=nodes(s0,1);
00096   double SOS1x=nodes(s1,0)-S0x;
00097   double SOS1y=nodes(s1,1)-S0y;
00098   double len=sqrt(SOS1x*SOS1x+SOS1y*SOS1y);
00099 
00100   coeff_plan.set(-SOS1y/len,SOS1x/len,0);
00101   d=-(S0x*coeff_plan[0]+S0y*coeff_plan[1]);
00102 
00103 
00104 }
00105 
00106 static int faces_sommets_hexa[6][4] =
00107 {
00108   { 0, 2, 4, 6 },
00109   { 0, 1, 4, 5 },
00110   { 0, 1, 2, 3 },
00111   { 1, 3, 5, 7 },
00112   { 2, 3, 6, 7 },
00113   { 4, 5, 6, 7 }
00114 };
00115 
00116 void calcul_plan_hexa(Vecteur3& coeff_plan,double& d,int cell,const IntTab& cells,const DoubleTab& nodes,int dir)
00117 {
00118 // Plan 012
00119   int s0=cells(cell,faces_sommets_hexa[dir][0]);
00120   int s1=cells(cell,faces_sommets_hexa[dir][1]);
00121   int s2=cells(cell,faces_sommets_hexa[dir][2]);
00122 
00123 
00124   Vecteur3 S0(nodes(s0,0),nodes(s0,1),nodes(s0,2));
00125   Vecteur3 S0S1(nodes(s1,0)-S0[0],nodes(s1,1)-S0[1],nodes(s1,2)-S0[2]);
00126   Vecteur3 S0S2(nodes(s2,0)-S0[0],nodes(s2,1)-S0[1],nodes(s2,2)-S0[2]);
00127   Vecteur3::produit_vectoriel(S0S1,S0S2,coeff_plan);
00128   coeff_plan*=(1./coeff_plan.length());
00129   d=-Vecteur3::produit_scalaire(coeff_plan,S0);
00130 }
00131 
00132 void Champ_implementation_Q1::value_interpolation(const DoubleTab& positions, const ArrOfInt& cells, const DoubleTab& values, DoubleTab& resu, int ncomp) const
00133 {
00134   const Zone&      zone  = get_zone_geom();
00135   const IntTab&    les_elems = zone.les_elems();
00136   const DoubleTab& nodes = zone.domaine().les_sommets();
00137   const int nb_nodes_per_cell = les_elems.dimension(1);
00138   ArrOfDouble position(Objet_U::dimension);
00139 
00140   Vecteur3 coeff_plan;
00141   double d;
00142   IntTab cell3D;
00143   Vecteur3 coord_bar;
00144 
00145   resu = 0;
00146   for (int ic=0; ic<cells.size_array(); ic++)
00147     {
00148       int cell = cells(ic);
00149       if (cell<0) continue;
00150       for (int k = 0; k < Objet_U::dimension; k++)
00151         position(k) = positions(ic, k);
00152 
00153       if (nb_nodes_per_cell == 4)
00154         {
00155           if (Objet_U::dimension == 3)
00156             {
00157               cell3D.resize(1, 8);
00158               for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00159                 cell3D(0, 2 * i) = les_elems(cell, i);
00160               calcul_plan_hexa(coeff_plan, d, 0, cell3D, nodes, 0);
00161               double A = d;
00162               for (int i = 0; i < Objet_U::dimension; i++) A += coeff_plan[i] * position(i);
00163               if (dabs(A) > dabs(d) * 1e-5)
00164                 {
00165                   Cerr << "Error point not in the plane " << finl;
00166                   Process::exit();
00167                 }
00168               coord_bar = 0.5;
00169             }
00170           else
00171             for (int dir = 0; dir < 2; dir++)
00172               {
00173 
00174                 calcul_plan_quadra(coeff_plan, d, cell, les_elems, nodes, dir);
00175                 double A = d;
00176                 for (int i = 0; i < Objet_U::dimension; i++) A += coeff_plan[i] * position(i);
00177                 calcul_plan_quadra(coeff_plan, d, cell, les_elems, nodes, dir + 2);
00178                 double B = d;
00179                 for (int i = 0; i < Objet_U::dimension; i++) B += coeff_plan[i] * position(i);
00180                 assert(inf_ou_egal((A * B), 0, 1e-10));
00181                 coord_bar[dir] = A / (A - B);
00182               }
00183         }
00184       else
00185         {
00186           assert(Objet_U::dimension == 3);
00187           for (int dir = 0; dir < 3; dir++)
00188             {
00189 
00190               calcul_plan_hexa(coeff_plan, d, cell, les_elems, nodes, dir);
00191               double A = d;
00192               for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) A += coeff_plan[i] * position(i);
00193               calcul_plan_hexa(coeff_plan, d, cell, les_elems, nodes, dir + 3);
00194               double B = d;
00195               for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) B += coeff_plan[i] * position(i);
00196               assert(inf_ou_egal((A * B), 0, 1e-10));
00197               coord_bar[dir] = A / (A - B);
00198             }
00199         }
00200       ArrOfDouble val(nb_nodes_per_cell);
00201       int nb_dim = resu.nb_dim();
00202       int nb_components = nb_dim == 1 ? 1 : resu.dimension_tot(1);
00203       for (int k = 0; k < nb_components; k++)
00204         {
00205           if (ncomp != -1)
00206             {
00207               for (int j = 0; j < nb_nodes_per_cell; j++)
00208                 {
00209                   int node = les_elems(cell, j);
00210                   val(j) = values(node, ncomp);
00211                 }
00212             }
00213           else
00214             {
00215               if (values.nb_dim() == 1)
00216                 {
00217                   for (int j = 0; j < nb_nodes_per_cell; j++)
00218                     {
00219                       int node = les_elems(cell, j);
00220                       val(j) = values(node);
00221                     }
00222                 }
00223               else
00224                 {
00225                   assert(values.nb_dim() == 2);
00226                   for (int j = 0; j < nb_nodes_per_cell; j++)
00227                     {
00228                       int node = les_elems(cell, j);
00229                       val(j) = values(node, k);
00230                     }
00231                 }
00232             }
00233           double res = 0;
00234           if (nb_nodes_per_cell == 4)
00235             {
00236               const double& i = coord_bar[0];
00237               const double& j = coord_bar[1];
00238               double unmi = 1. - i;
00239               double unmj = 1. - j;
00240 
00241               res = unmj * (unmi * val[0] + i * val[1])
00242                     + j * (unmi * val[2] + i * val[3]);
00243             }
00244           else
00245             {
00246               assert(Objet_U::dimension == 3);
00247               const double& i = coord_bar[0];
00248               const double& j = coord_bar[1];
00249               const double& kk = coord_bar[2];
00250               double unmi = 1. - i;
00251               double unmj = 1. - j;
00252               double unmk = 1. - kk;
00253               res = unmk * (unmj * (unmi * val[0] + i * val[1])
00254                             + j * (unmi * val[2] + i * val[3]))
00255                     + kk * (unmj * (unmi * val[4] + i * val[5])
00256                             + j * (unmi * val[6] + i * val[7]));
00257             }
00258           if (nb_dim==1)
00259             resu(ic) = res;
00260           else
00261             resu(ic, k) = res;
00262         }
00263     }
00264 }
00265 #endif

00268 
00269 static int info=0;
00270 
00271 double Champ_implementation_Q1::form_function(const ArrOfDouble& position, int cell, int ddl) const
00272 {
00273   if (info==0)
00274     {
00275       Cerr << "***********************************************************************" << finl;
00276       Cerr << "Warning : shape functions of the Q1 elements are not coded !" << finl;
00277       Cerr << finl;
00278       Cerr << "For the moment, the value of the elements is not interpolated." << finl;
00279       Cerr << "It returns the average value on the element, ie the point value" << finl;
00280       Cerr << "at the barycenter of the element" << finl;
00281       Cerr << finl;
00282       Cerr << "It is therefore recommended to postprocess the Q1 fields only"<< finl;
00283       Cerr << "on mesh nodes." << finl;
00284       Cerr << "***********************************************************************" << finl;
00285       info=1;
00286     }
00287 
00288 
00289   const Zone& zone_geom = get_zone_geom();
00290   int test_sommet=1;
00291   if (test_sommet)
00292     {
00293       const IntTab& cells    = zone_geom.les_elems();
00294       const DoubleTab& nodes = zone_geom.domaine().les_sommets();
00295 
00296       int nb_nodes_per_cell = cells.dimension(1);
00297       int sc=-1;
00298       double l=Objet_U::precision_geom*Objet_U::precision_geom;
00299       for (int s=0; s<nb_nodes_per_cell; s++)
00300         {
00301           int som=cells(cell,s);
00302           double dist=0;
00303           for (int j=0; j<Objet_U::dimension; j++)
00304             {
00305               double dx=(nodes(som,j)-position(j));
00306               dist+=dx*dx;
00307             }
00308           if (dist<l)
00309             sc=s;
00310         }
00311       if (sc!=-1)
00312         {
00313 // Cerr<< ddl<< " sc "<< sc <<finl;
00314           if (ddl==sc)
00315             return 1;
00316           else
00317             return 0;
00318         }
00319 
00320     }
00321   double factor = 1./zone_geom.nb_som_elem();
00322   return factor;
00323 }
